string-array.name: simple_answers
string-array.item: It is an open-source operating system that is used primarily on mobile devices.
The Google Android SDK is a toolset that developers need in order to write apps on Android enabled devices.
The Android Framework is an important aspect of the android Architecture.
Activities are what you refer to as the window to a user interface. actually to which user interact with.
Intents help to move across the activities window and can help to pass data back and forth.
